https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aGp9XDXmVM5lCKHWtgBC15S7XLr.jpg Damian Wayne is having a hard time coping with his father's "no killing" rule. Meanwhile, Gotham is going through hell with threats such as the insane Dollmaker, and the secretive Court of Owls. Batman vs. Robin
